snippet.title: Bungie's Myth video game: Explosions and other cool effects
snippet.description:
This is a combination of several gameplay videos from Myth The Fallen Lords and Myth 2 Soulblighter (made by Bungie). They show some cool things like explosions (dwarves, deer, fire balls, wights), lightning and dispersal dream. The explosions are slowed down heavily (nearly to slideshow speed).

Remember that these games were released in 1997 and 1998 years respectively. The physics is awesome for that time.

After watching this you'll understand how fragile most of the units are and how powerful some of the units are in Myth:)
